30705.name: Display for role
30705.description:
A plugin that allows managing roles by show-hide function


Prerequisites:

  • Add _roles page to your Figma file
  • Add a list of nodes with the names of your roles on _roles page
  • Plugin will automatically find this list and you can apply them to elements you want
  • Select the parent frame or group and then select the role and click show

32830.name: Rotate replicas
32830.description:
Check out the demo: https://twitter.com/imohanvadivel/status/1528290607160250370


  • Select a node and run the plugin
  • Enter the total number of nodes to be created (inclusive of the initial node)
  • All replicas, along with the handle, appear on the canvas
  • Drag the red handle to rotate other nodes accordingly


Tip

Since the handle is a line node, you can use Figma's default alignment option to quickly position the origin.


File bugs: https://github.com/imohanvadivel/rotate-replicas/issues

32753.name: Random Email Address Generator
32753.description:
Generates random email addresses from text. Simply select your text, and run the plugin.


Made by @starscope and @decrae

32359.description:
Sometimes you just want to quickly change radius on multiple selection, wouldnâ€™t be that rad? ğŸ˜�


Now you can! Select any layer(s) that contain radius, and change it to your liking (including children layers).


How to use

  1. Select layer(s) that contain radius value
  2. Open quick actions panel
  3. Look for â€œRad Dudeâ€� and hit Tab
  4. Type in your desired radius value or select from the list, hit enter

parameters.description: Enter a border radius (e.g. 14), or select below capsule token

32931.name: Random Color
32931.description:
After multiple layers are selected in batch, fill each layer with random colors with one click.

32680.name: Whitelabel Colour Generator
32680.description:
A plugin built specifically for the OnCall team! This plugin will take an accounts primary brand colour and generate supporting colours. 


The colours that will be generated are:

  • Dark Primary
  • Light Primary
  • Off-White Primary
  • UI Primary

32450.name: BlipAnalytics
32450.description: Plugin para analizes de dados da takeblip

31367.name: Figma To Stitches
31367.description:
Unofficial Stitches Plugin that converts Figma styles to Stitches config


Forked from Figma to Tailwind plugin https://github.com/jan-dh/figma-tailwindcss

30823.name: Crylic
30823.description:
Integrate Crylic with Figma!


This plugin supports importing elements exported through Crylic.

Learn more at https://docs.crylic.io/workflows/exporting-to-figma

32809.name: Explode Frames
32809.description:
Detach all component instances and disable all auto layouts in a given selection.


Revert file to a setup closer to traditional design softwares for quick iterations, isolated studies and collaboration with non-designers.


Use with caution.

32776.name: Dark Matter
32776.description:
Quickly switch between light and dark canvas. 


Usage:

  1. Install â€˜Dark Matterâ€™ Plugin.
  2. Run the plugin once.
  3. When no frame is selected, the plugin will appear in the Properties Panel (Design).
  4. Switch between light (#E5E5E5) and dark (#1E1E1E) canvas by clicking the button. 


The best part - thereâ€™s no need to rerun the plugin. Once run, itâ€™s available on all your pages for that particular file.


I also made a website for the plugin, check it out? You'll like it.


If you use this and find it helpful, Iâ€™d love to hear from you. Iâ€™m @KhatriDakshi on Twitter. Or support me here.


Lastly, if you come across a bug or if you have any ideas, share that too.


Enjoy!â�¤ï¸�

32490.name: SSelect
32490.description:
Make quick selections in quick actions. âœ¨


Extending the built in "Select all with ..." commands and without the need to open ui, all happens in the quick actions. Just âŒ˜ + / and sselect!


ğŸ�¯ Selection:


Select nodes with same types, names, or main components becomes few keys away.


Instance

  • Select all instances within parent frame
  • Select all instances within root frame
  • Select all instances

Type

  • Select all with same type within parent frame
  • Select all with same type within root frame
  • Select all with same type

Name

  • Select all with same name within parent frame
  • Select all with same name within root frame
  • Select all with same name


ğŸ”� Search and Select:


Search within selection or in page for deeply nested nodes, using filter to make the search more easily to select!


Filter type

  • All
  • Frame
  • Component
  • Component set
  • Group
  • Slice
  • Media
  • Text
  • Vector
  • Rectangle
  • Ellipse
  • Polygon
  • Star
  • Line
  • Sticky
  • Section
  • Stamp
  • Connector
  • Widget
  • Shape with text


Search by name

  • Appearance amount


â�“ Suggestion


Open an issue or email for suggestions, thanks in advance!

menu.name: All with same name within parent frame
All with same name within root frame
All with same type within parent frame
All with same type within root frame

parameters.name: Search Name
parameters.description: Search and select elements by name

32490.release_notes:
- Improve type suggestion
- Handle cases when nodes with same name but different types
- Improve search performance

32920.name: Figma to Flashtalking
32920.description: Quickly convert your Figma project to animated and dynamic Flashtalking ads.

33080.name: Fiona Copy Pasta
33080.description: Copy and paste Figma layouts and convert them to production ready jsx code

32742.name: Refine
32742.description: Simple plugin for Karat design team, to quickly set up Figma files.
